trans-unit.source: Each property of the <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemBrushes"></xref> class is a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of a Windows display element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the active window's border.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the active window's border.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the application workspace.
The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the application workspace.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the face color of a 3-D element.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the face color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the face color of a 3-D element.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the face color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
The shadow color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.
The dark shadow color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the darkest color.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the light color of a 3-D element.
The light color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the light color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
The highlight color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the lightest color.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of text in a 3-D element.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of text in a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the desktop.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the desktop.
Creates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure from which to create the <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> this method creates.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of dimmed text.
Disabled items in a list are displayed in dimmed text.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of dimmed text.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of selected items.
Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text.
For example, the brush may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of selected items.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the text of selected items.
Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text.
For example, the brush may be the color used for the text of selected items in a list box.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the text of selected items.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.
Single-clicking a hot-tracked item executes the item.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of an inactive window's border.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of an inactive window's border.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of a ToolTip.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of a ToolTip.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the text of a ToolTip.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> is the color of the text of a ToolTip.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of a menu's background.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of a menu's background.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of a menu bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of a menu bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of a menu's text.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of a menu's text.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of a scroll bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background of a scroll bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background in the client area of a window.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the background in the client area of a window.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of a window frame.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of a window frame.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SolidBrush"></xref> that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.
